meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>deviate</kanji> from the plan and <kanji>escape</kanji> from it, that's a serious <vocabulary>deviation</vocabulary> and could ruin everything! Stick to the plan! Stop deviating!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
